aboutUsArray.subtitle: Beekeeper Honey
aboutUsArray.text: Professional beekeepers take agreat care of the farm and monitor all processes to gather honey in time.

aboutUsArray.subtitle: Bee Garden
aboutUsArray.text: We have built a tru cosy garden where our hard working bees produce all sorts of local honey and nectars.

aboutUsArray.subtitle: Bee Products
aboutUsArray.text: Our products are 100% organic, produced on a farm with natural ingredients addition only. Sweet & delicious.
